snippet.title: Malus Pre-Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
I have just recently launched an IndieGoGo campaign for this game, Please visit
https://igg.me/at/malusRPG/x/23112165#/

My goal with this game is to create a compelling story-driven action RPG that aims to bring back that erie, unnerving feeling you get when playing Diablo 1 and Diablo 2 (which are my two biggest inspiration)

The basic idea of this game is to combine a Dark Souls like combat system, to  and action RPG format, sheathing and drawing weapon plays an important role, your character moves faster when weapons are sheathed, but take more damage AND you cant change equipment when your weapons are drawn, which restrict players from changing items mid-combat.

This game will be difficult, no hand holding here. I want to bring back the old-school style of video games. Tutorials are minimal, you learn by using common sense and trial and error. Like how video games used to be, back in the day.

Visit our website at https://www.projectmalus.com
